about_the_game: This is a Demo for the game [ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality. This includes the first 2 levels of the game. Save progress will not be transferred over to the full game as some content between the Demo and Full release will not be included.

content_descriptors.notes: In this demo the player is able to be killed by creatures which where once human.

detailed_description: This is a Demo for the game [ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality. This includes the first 2 levels of the game. Save progress will not be transferred over to the full game as some content between the Demo and Full release will not be included.
name: [ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Experience the beginning of the nightmare in this demo for '[ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality.' Play through the first two tapes, encounter eerie entities, and unravel the first clues to the hidden mysteries. Can you survive the horrors that await?
